Enhanced Summary for SaTScan Results

Source: R/satscan_result_s3_methods.R
summary.satscan_result.Rd

Creates a detailed summary object containing cluster statistics, location summaries, and analysis metadata. Returns a structured object of class summary.satscan_result with a custom print method.

Usage

# S3 method for class 'satscan_result'
summary(object, ...)

Arguments

object

A satscan_result object from satscanr().

...

Additional arguments (currently unused).

Value

An object of class summary.satscan_result containing:

n_clusters

Total number of detected clusters

n_significant

Number of clusters with p < 0.05

n_locations

Total number of locations analyzed

n_in_clusters

Number of locations belonging to clusters

cluster_stats

Summary statistics for clusters (if available)

location_stats

Summary statistics for locations

most_likely

Details of the most likely cluster (if exists)

rr_range

Range of relative risks (if available)

analysis_params

Analysis parameters (if stored)

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
result <- satscanr(cas, geo, pop, ...)
summary(result)
} # }
